mapper.sql: SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( ((months_between(trunc(sysdate,'mm') , trunc(t1.kqkssj,'mm'))>=0) and (trunc(sysdate)-trunc(t1.kqjssj)<=0) and t51.pimpersonid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')} and t1.spzt <> '20' and t1.spzt <> '30' ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.CSRQ) / 12) AS AGE, t1.APPROVALSTATUS, t51.CERTTIFICATE AS CERTIFICATEABILITY, t1.CONTRESULTONE, t1.CONTRESULTTWO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t51.GW AS CURPOST, t11.GCMCJBM, t1.GW, t31.ISKEYPOSTION, t1.ISTEMP, t1.KQJSSJ, t1.KQKSSJ, t1.MAJORRESP, t21.PIMPERSONNAME AS MODPERSONNAME, t1.MODPIMPERSONID, t1.MODSPZT, t11.ORGINFOID AS ORGID, t11.ORGINFOID, t11.ORGSECINFOID, t11.ORGSHORTNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t31.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQID, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQNAME, t1.ORMXMXQJHID, t51.YGBH AS PERSONNUM, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PLANSTATE, t1.REALARRIVALTIME, t1.REALLEAVETIME, t1.REALPEROSNID, t61.PIMPERSONNAME AS REALPERSONNAME, t1.REASON, t51.XB AS SEX, t1.SFJJYY, t1.SPZT, t1.TPJJYY, t1.TPSPZT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t11.XMBMC, t41.GCMCJBM AS XMMC FROM T_ORMXMRYPZXQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( ((months_between(trunc(sysdate,'mm') , trunc(t1.kqkssj,'mm'))>=0) and (trunc(sysdate)-trunc(t1.kqjssj)<=0) and t51.pimpersonid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')} and t1.spzt <> '20' and t1.spzt <> '30' ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( ((months_between(trunc(sysdate,'mm') , trunc(t1.kqkssj,'mm'))>=0) and (trunc(sysdate)-trunc(t1.kqjssj)<=0) and t51.pimpersonid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')} and t1.tpspzt <> '20' and t1.tpspzt <> '30' ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.CSRQ) / 12) AS AGE, t1.APPROVALSTATUS, t51.CERTTIFICATE AS CERTIFICATEABILITY, t1.CONTRESULTONE, t1.CONTRESULTTWO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t51.GW AS CURPOST, t11.GCMCJBM, t1.GW, t31.ISKEYPOSTION, t1.ISTEMP, t1.KQJSSJ, t1.KQKSSJ, t1.MAJORRESP, t21.PIMPERSONNAME AS MODPERSONNAME, t1.MODPIMPERSONID, t1.MODSPZT, t11.ORGINFOID AS ORGID, t11.ORGINFOID, t11.ORGSECINFOID, t11.ORGSHORTNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t31.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQID, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQNAME, t1.ORMXMXQJHID, t51.YGBH AS PERSONNUM, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PLANSTATE, t1.REALARRIVALTIME, t1.REALLEAVETIME, t1.REALPEROSNID, t61.PIMPERSONNAME AS REALPERSONNAME, t1.REASON, t51.XB AS SEX, t1.SFJJYY, t1.SPZT, t1.TPJJYY, t1.TPSPZT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t11.XMBMC, t41.GCMCJBM AS XMMC FROM T_ORMXMRYPZXQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( ((months_between(trunc(sysdate,'mm') , trunc(t1.kqkssj,'mm'))>=0) and (trunc(sysdate)-trunc(t1.kqjssj)<=0) and t51.pimpersonid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')} and t1.tpspzt <> '20' and t1.tpspzt <> '30' ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.`APPROVALSTATUS` = '30' AND ( t51.pimpersonid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')} ) AND ( t51.approvalstatus = '30' and t51.editionstate = '10' ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.CSRQ) / 12) AS AGE, t1.APPROVALSTATUS, t51.CERTTIFICATE AS CERTIFICATEABILITY, t1.CONTRESULTONE, t1.CONTRESULTTWO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t51.GW AS CURPOST, t11.GCMCJBM, t1.GW, t31.ISKEYPOSTION, t1.ISTEMP, t1.KQJSSJ, t1.KQKSSJ, t1.MAJORRESP, t21.PIMPERSONNAME AS MODPERSONNAME, t1.MODPIMPERSONID, t1.MODSPZT, t11.ORGINFOID AS ORGID, t11.ORGINFOID, t11.ORGSECINFOID, t11.ORGSHORTNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t31.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQID, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQNAME, t1.ORMXMXQJHID, t51.YGBH AS PERSONNUM, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PLANSTATE, t1.REALARRIVALTIME, t1.REALLEAVETIME, t1.REALPEROSNID, t61.PIMPERSONNAME AS REALPERSONNAME, t1.REASON, t51.XB AS SEX, t1.SFJJYY, t1.SPZT, t1.TPJJYY, t1.TPSPZT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t11.XMBMC, t41.GCMCJBM AS XMMC FROM T_ORMXMRYPZXQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.APPROVALSTATUS = '30' AND ( t51.pimpersonid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')} ) AND ( t51.approvalstatus = '30' and t51.editionstate = '10' ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.CSRQ) / 12) AS AGE, t1.APPROVALSTATUS, t51.CERTTIFICATE AS CERTIFICATEABILITY, t1.CONTRESULTONE, t1.CONTRESULTTWO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t51.GW AS CURPOST, t11.GCMCJBM, t1.GW, t31.ISKEYPOSTION, t1.ISTEMP, t1.KQJSSJ, t1.KQKSSJ, t1.MAJORRESP, t21.PIMPERSONNAME AS MODPERSONNAME, t1.MODPIMPERSONID, t1.MODSPZT, t11.ORGINFOID AS ORGID, t11.ORGINFOID, t11.ORGSECINFOID, t11.ORGSHORTNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t31.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQID, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQNAME, t1.ORMXMXQJHID, t51.YGBH AS PERSONNUM, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PLANSTATE, t1.REALARRIVALTIME, t1.REALLEAVETIME, t1.REALPEROSNID, t61.PIMPERSONNAME AS REALPERSONNAME, t1.REASON, t51.XB AS SEX, t1.SFJJYY, t1.SPZT, t1.TPJJYY, t1.TPSPZT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t11.XMBMC, t41.GCMCJBM AS XMMC FROM T_ORMXMRYPZXQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( ( t1.`APPROVALSTATUS` IS NULL OR t1.`APPROVALSTATUS` = '10' OR t1.`APPROVALSTATUS` = '40' ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.CSRQ) / 12) AS AGE, t1.APPROVALSTATUS, t51.CERTTIFICATE AS CERTIFICATEABILITY, t1.CONTRESULTONE, t1.CONTRESULTTWO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t51.GW AS CURPOST, t11.GCMCJBM, t1.GW, t31.ISKEYPOSTION, t1.ISTEMP, t1.KQJSSJ, t1.KQKSSJ, t1.MAJORRESP, t21.PIMPERSONNAME AS MODPERSONNAME, t1.MODPIMPERSONID, t1.MODSPZT, t11.ORGINFOID AS ORGID, t11.ORGINFOID, t11.ORGSECINFOID, t11.ORGSHORTNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t31.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQID, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQNAME, t1.ORMXMXQJHID, t51.YGBH AS PERSONNUM, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PLANSTATE, t1.REALARRIVALTIME, t1.REALLEAVETIME, t1.REALPEROSNID, t61.PIMPERSONNAME AS REALPERSONNAME, t1.REASON, t51.XB AS SEX, t1.SFJJYY, t1.SPZT, t1.TPJJYY, t1.TPSPZT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t11.XMBMC, t41.GCMCJBM AS XMMC FROM T_ORMXMRYPZXQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( ( t1.APPROVALSTATUS IS NULL OR t1.APPROVALSTATUS = '10' OR t1.APPROVALSTATUS = '40' ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.`APPROVALSTATUS` = '30' AND t1.`MODSPZT` <> '20' )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.CSRQ) / 12) AS AGE, t1.APPROVALSTATUS, t51.CERTTIFICATE AS CERTIFICATEABILITY, t1.CONTRESULTONE, t1.CONTRESULTTWO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t51.GW AS CURPOST, t11.GCMCJBM, t1.GW, t31.ISKEYPOSTION, t1.ISTEMP, t1.KQJSSJ, t1.KQKSSJ, t1.MAJORRESP, t21.PIMPERSONNAME AS MODPERSONNAME, t1.MODPIMPERSONID, t1.MODSPZT, t11.ORGINFOID AS ORGID, t11.ORGINFOID, t11.ORGSECINFOID, t11.ORGSHORTNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t31.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQID, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQNAME, t1.ORMXMXQJHID, t51.YGBH AS PERSONNUM, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PLANSTATE, t1.REALARRIVALTIME, t1.REALLEAVETIME, t1.REALPEROSNID, t61.PIMPERSONNAME AS REALPERSONNAME, t1.REASON, t51.XB AS SEX, t1.SFJJYY, t1.SPZT, t1.TPJJYY, t1.TPSPZT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t11.XMBMC, t41.GCMCJBM AS XMMC FROM T_ORMXMRYPZXQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.APPROVALSTATUS = '30' AND t1.MODSPZT <> '20' )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.`MODSPZT` = '20' AND ( ( ( (o1.ORGID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} OR INSTR(o1.LEVELCODE, (select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} )) = 1) and (select length(b.orgcode) from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) =3 ) AND t31.`ISKEYPOSTION` = '1' ) OR ( ( o1.ORGID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} ) AND ( t31.`ISKEYPOSTION` = '0' OR t31.`ISKEYPOSTION` IS NULL ) ) ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.`TPSPZT` = '20' AND ( ( ( (o1.ORGID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} OR INSTR(o1.LEVELCODE, (select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} )) = 1) and (select length(b.orgcode) from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) =3 ) AND t31.`ISKEYPOSTION` = '1' ) OR ( ( o1.ORGID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} ) AND ( t31.`ISKEYPOSTION` = '0' OR t31.`ISKEYPOSTION` IS NULL ) ) ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.CSRQ) / 12) AS AGE, t1.APPROVALSTATUS, t51.CERTTIFICATE AS CERTIFICATEABILITY, t1.CONTRESULTONE, t1.CONTRESULTTWO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t51.GW AS CURPOST, t11.GCMCJBM, t1.GW, t31.ISKEYPOSTION, t1.ISTEMP, t1.KQJSSJ, t1.KQKSSJ, t1.MAJORRESP, t21.PIMPERSONNAME AS MODPERSONNAME, t1.MODPIMPERSONID, t1.MODSPZT, t11.ORGINFOID AS ORGID, t11.ORGINFOID, t11.ORGSECINFOID, t11.ORGSHORTNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t31.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQID, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQNAME, t1.ORMXMXQJHID, t51.YGBH AS PERSONNUM, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PLANSTATE, t1.REALARRIVALTIME, t1.REALLEAVETIME, t1.REALPEROSNID, t61.PIMPERSONNAME AS REALPERSONNAME, t1.REASON, t51.XB AS SEX, t1.SFJJYY, t1.SPZT, t1.TPJJYY, t1.TPSPZT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t11.XMBMC, t41.GCMCJBM AS XMMC FROM T_ORMXMRYPZXQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.TPSPZT = '20' AND ( ( ( (o1.ORGID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} OR INSTR(o1.LEVELCODE, (select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} )) = 1) and (select length(b.orgcode) from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) =3 ) AND t31.ISKEYPOSTION = '1' ) OR ( ( o1.ORGID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} ) AND ( t31.ISKEYPOSTION = '0' OR t31.ISKEYPOSTION IS NULL ) ) ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.`CSRQ`) / 12) AS `AGE`, t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t51.`CERTTIFICATE` AS `CERTIFICATEABILITY`, t1.`CONTRESULTONE`, t1.`CONTRESULTTWO`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t51.`GW` AS `CURPOST`, t11.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GW`, t31.`ISKEYPOSTION`, t1.`ISTEMP`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`MAJORRESP`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `MODPERSONNAME`, t1.`MODPIMPERSONID`, t1.`MODSPZT`, t11.`ORGINFOID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORGINFOID`, t11.`ORGSECINFOID`, t11.`ORGSHORTNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t31.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQID`, t1.`ORMXMRYPZXQNAME`, t1.`ORMXMXQJHID`, t51.`YGBH` AS `PERSONNUM`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t51.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PLANSTATE`, t1.`REALARRIVALTIME`, t1.`REALLEAVETIME`, t1.`REALPEROSNID`, t61.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `REALPERSONNAME`, t1.`REASON`, t51.`XB` AS `SEX`, t1.`SFJJYY`, t1.`SPZT`, t1.`TPJJYY`, t1.`TPSPZT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t11.`XMBMC`, t41.`GCMCJBM` AS `XMMC` FROM `T_ORMXMRYPZXQ` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.`APPROVALSTATUS` = '30' AND ( t1.`ORMXMXQJHID` = #{srf.datacontext.srfkey} OR t1.`ORMXMXQJHID` = #{srf.webcontext.srfkey} ) )

SELECT floor(months_between(SYSDATE,t51.CSRQ) / 12) AS AGE, t1.APPROVALSTATUS, t51.CERTTIFICATE AS CERTIFICATEABILITY, t1.CONTRESULTONE, t1.CONTRESULTTWO, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t51.GW AS CURPOST, t11.GCMCJBM, t1.GW, t31.ISKEYPOSTION, t1.ISTEMP, t1.KQJSSJ, t1.KQKSSJ, t1.MAJORRESP, t21.PIMPERSONNAME AS MODPERSONNAME, t1.MODPIMPERSONID, t1.MODSPZT, t11.ORGINFOID AS ORGID, t11.ORGINFOID, t11.ORGSECINFOID, t11.ORGSHORTNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t31.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQID, t1.ORMXMRYPZXQNAME, t1.ORMXMXQJHID, t51.YGBH AS PERSONNUM, t1.PIMPERSONID, t51.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PLANSTATE, t1.REALARRIVALTIME, t1.REALLEAVETIME, t1.REALPEROSNID, t61.PIMPERSONNAME AS REALPERSONNAME, t1.REASON, t51.XB AS SEX, t1.SFJJYY, t1.SPZT, t1.TPJJYY, t1.TPSPZT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t11.XMBMC, t41.GCMCJBM AS XMMC FROM T_ORMXMRYPZXQ t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMXQJH t11 ON t1.ORMXMXQJHID = t11.ORMXMXQJHID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.MODPIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t31 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t31.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t51 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t51.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t61 ON t1.REALPEROSNID = t61.PIMPERSONID WHERE ( t1.APPROVALSTATUS = '30' AND ( t1.ORMXMXQJHID = #{srf.datacontext.srfkey} OR t1.ORMXMXQJHID = #{srf.webcontext.srfkey} ) )
